Items.r: 【{color=#FFD700}絕學{/color}】開啟條件招式：{color=#FF0000}雷積電蓄{/color}\n連續向前踢擊的強力遠程招式，使用後強制結束{color=#FF0000}雷積電蓄{/color}\n狀態，附帶麻痺。傷害隨著段數提高。

Items.mt: <[>Jedi<]>Start condition: a powerful, long-range move that kicks forward continuously, forcing the end of the <<\n>> state with paralysis. Damage increases with the number of stages.

Items.r: 【{color=#FFD700}绝学{/color}】开启条件招式：{color=#FF0000}雷积电蓄{/color}\n连续向前踢击的强力远程招式，使用后强制结束{color=#FF0000}雷积电蓄{/color}\n状态，附带麻痹。伤害随着段数提高。
